It is promising If you developers put in the same functions as a hp prime or a hp 50g you could profit a lot. There is no good competidor app for this. Even wolfram, because doesnt works offline. Think on engineering students that need to solve 5x5 linear systems or work with vectors, polynomial regressions and int...Full ReviewIf you developers put in the same functions as a hp prime or a hp 50g you could profit a lot. There is no good competidor app for this. Even wolfram, because doesnt works offline. Think on engineering students that need to solve 5x5 linear systems or work with vectors, polynomial regressions and interpolations. If you make a fancy hp prime app, I'm absolutely sure that I'll buy it!!!

The calculator actually looks very nice and performs great except for one thing. Enter this in the calculator...6/2(1+2) and you get 1.  The correct answer is 9.  How much more does not follow standards is what bothers me.  Fix this order of operations goof for 5 stars.

This is my favorite scientific calculator in the market. And it is my favorite because it is simple yet powerful, and visually polished. For example a lot of calculators miss 'E' symbol that let you to enter numbers in scientific notation. Or one tap switch between fixed number of digits, engineerin...Full ReviewThis is my favorite scientific calculator in the market. And it is my favorite because it is simple yet powerful, and visually polished. For example a lot of calculators miss 'E' symbol that let you to enter numbers in scientific notation. Or one tap switch between fixed number of digits, engineering or scientific representation. Or dedicated button for -1 power. I really hope that new features will not break simplicity and convenience of this calculator.

Do not download this app. I did a calculation using sin45 and it gave the wrong figure, which caused me to get something made, which didn't fit! Worse than utterly useless.  Apparently the default is Radians unlike all other Scientific Calculators I've ever known including the fx series.

At last i found one scientific calculator I searched so many aps for a better scientific calculator.  Usually i found that installed aps contains adds.  And i am not satisfied at all. Also in other aps i found some irregular answers.  Eg.  If i want to know sin 30. For that i first type sin. I got an error instead of answer even i didn t ty...Full ReviewI searched so many aps for a better scientific calculator.  Usually i found that installed aps contains adds.  And i am not satisfied at all. Also in other aps i found some irregular answers.  Eg.  If i want to know sin 30. For that i first type sin. I got an error instead of answer even i didn t type 30. But i aM happy to share that this ap have no such errors.  It is just as like my scientific calculator
